actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to add sulfanilic acid to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designated as articles eligible for duty-free treatment.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to add sulfanilic acid to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designated as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences.

titles.title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to add sulfanilic acid to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designated as articles eligible for duty-free treatment.
